meanings.sent1: I videotaped my cat playing with a ball.
meanings.sent2: She always videotaped her family gatherings to cherish the memories.
meanings.sent3: The detective videotaped the suspect sneezing at the crime scene.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a videotaped moment, frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The sunset was so beautiful that I wished I could have videotaped it.

meanings.definition: Past tense and past participle of videotape.
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I videotaped the school play for the drama club.
meanings.sent2: They have videotaped all the episodes of their favorite TV show.
meanings.sent3: The teacher videotaped the students' funny dance moves during the break.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a videotaped confession of his true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The storm was so intense that it felt like nature had videotaped its fury.
